metadata.title: CVE-2023-52814 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix potential null pointer derefernce Theamdgpu_ras_get_context may return NULL if device not support ras feature,so add check before using.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
